xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/78709-Blaze Foley: Duct Tape Messiah 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hchiD31wrLuyLbIyszWmi8W1ucx.jpg Born in a tree house, killed in a friend’s living room, and 86’d from his own funeral Blaze Foley is now a bona fide Texas legend. His songs are covered by Merle Haggard, Lyle Lovett, John Prine, Willie Nelson and Joe Nichols. This new documentary movie brings his story to life on the screen for you. Blaze Foley: Duct Tape Messiah
